main.p: If your projectʼs products are Endings-compliant, you can download a package of our logos in various formats, and add one to your site.
Si les produits de votre projet sont conformes aux principes Endings, vous pouvez télécharger un ensemble de nos logos dans différents formats et en ajouter un sur votre site.
As a supplement to the Endings projectʼs accomplishments and outcomes, we list here a collection of resources that we have found useful, especially in the early phases of our research.

En complément des réalisations et des résultats du projet Endings, nous présentons ici une liste de ressources que nous avons trouvées utiles, en particulier dans les premières phases de notre recherche.

ul.li: The Digital Documentation Process, “Make your DH projects findable, citable, and stable.” https://digitalhumanitiesddp.com

The Socio-Technical Sustainability Roadmap “[O]ne of the deliverables from the NEH-funded project, ‘Sustaining MedArt,’ that was housed from 2016-2018 in the University of Pittsburgh’s Visual Media Workshop (VMW).” It offers a project survey walkthrough to help you think about the long-term preservation of your projects. https://sites.haa.pitt.edu/sustainabilityroadmap/

main.p: This list demonstrates that preservation has been a concern of the DH community since the late 1990s. We present the list in two parts in order to demonstrate our awareness of the increasing attention to the challenges addressed in our project.

Cette liste montre que la préservation est une préoccupation de la communauté des DH depuis la fin des années 1990. Nous présentons la liste en deux parties afin de montrer que nous sommes conscients de l'attention croissante portée aux défis abordés par notre projet.
main.h4: Part I: Early warnings, up to 2005

Not very scholarly, but some excellent quotations, such as “Digital preservation is essentially a hot potato problem, where everyone wants to pass responsibility onward” (Francine Berman, chair of the Research Data Alliance and professor of computer science at Rensselaer Polytechnic Institute).]
